html:
2026-0061
2026-01-30JUSJudges ActOrder authorizing the leave of absence of the Hon. Honourable Sylvia Corthorn Order approving a leave of absence to the Honourable Sylvia Corthorn, a Judge of the Superior Court of Ontario, from her judicial duties December 9, 2025, until June 8, 2026, on account of ill-health.N/A
subject: Order authorizing the leave of absence of the Hon. Honourable Sylvia Corthorn
precis: Order approving a leave of absence to the Honourable Sylvia Corthorn, a Judge of the Superior Court of Ontario, from her judicial duties December 9, 2025, until June 8, 2026, on account of ill-health.
